header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Making plans, sport, driving, weather, money, family, law, work, pets, books
header.activity: Mother and daughter talking over coffee.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, making arangements, apologizing

body.u: so how come you're back so early? I thought you had a tennis lesson

and having made the arrangement with last Tuesday carefully explaining to him that I couldn't do tomorrow because of the funeral he said well okay I can do twelve o'clock on Monday fine so I toddles along at twelve o'clock today to be told that 's on a course at
but had obviously not bothered to write it down
so he'd just completely forgotten you?
no I didn't I allowed myself a little bit of time to not be quite so cross and I had er half an hour with well more than half an hour three-quarters of an hour with one of the other coaches there
what he just happened to be free?
yes he just happened to be there and wasn't doing anything for three-quarters of an hour so I had that with and then I texted
and said and who forgot twelve o'clock today? And I said I will be expecting a suitably grovelling apology
he did he did he did
yes oh no how could I have done that? Yeah well I know how you could do it because you didn't damn well write it down
huh he's so disorganized at times he drives me round the bend
So what else did he say?
um oh how can I make it up to you?
I was tempted to say well you can give me a free lesson
but I thought no that's that's a bit much
um but I rearranged it for Wednesday
at twelve o'clock now it'll be interesting to see whether he forgets that one as well um I mean ag again he sent back er how could I have done that?
and so I sent back well you do have a track record cos this is not the first time
aw don't make him feel too bad
and the last time he did it to the lady he has before me on a Tuesday and we were both not amused
and he got a roasting from both of us
not not only that but I bought him a little notebook
well that's the thing I think a lot of people nowadays are d relying on their mobile phones
to do things like keep appointments
and stuff but it's such a difficult interface
I for for example I much prefer to write something down
than to than to put it in my phone because you have to unblock your phone
enter duddle uddle er tick on the click on the right thing like the voice notes or the
when we were talking about it last Tuesday he he didn't put it in his phone he didn't look at his phone he just said I can do twelve o'clock on Monday
now whether this course came up since he did that but he'd forgotten it anyway so it doesn't really matter
but er no I I'll make him pay on Wednesday don't worry
very young but very nice very pleasant and he was much kinder to me than is he didn't put things at me very hard and he didn't put things at me where I got to run a lot
which was very nice of him um but no it was interesting
do you find tennis to be a good workout? Because whenever I've
whenever I've played tennis I don't actually find it to be that
if you're playing a game doubles particularly no it's not but this is a lesson where we're doing various drills and practices and then we play singles at the end and that is hard work
Cos you've got to cover the whole of the court um so yes it it it is a good workout it certainly makes me
maybe I just wasn't doing it right
no doubles when we play doubles at the end of the Monday night it's not you don't get that many rallies going in doubles
um and it just isn't isn't the same
so no the the the lessons themselves are a good workout
and what about the aqua aerobics? Is that a good workout?
it depends it aqua aerobics is the sort of thing you can do as hard or not as you like depends entirely how much you use the water for resistance
um and most people don't strangely enough the whole idea of aqua aerobics is to use the water re as resistance but you can't do that unless you're actually below surface of the water
and so many people are up way out of the water so their arms are half in the water instead of right down cos when you're pulling and pushing against the water
and it's so you can make it as easy or as hard as you like depending on how you feel on the night
depending on how cold the water is

and lately they've had trouble with the boiler and it the temperature of the water was definitely down and then the bul the boiler bust completely so it was out of commission the pool was out of commission for a couple of days
yep not good and the spa pool was out as well cos all the boiler heats all the water
is the spa pool usually hot?
just go and sit in it and it bubbles and it's lovely
but aqua aerobics are you supposed to be I mean you ha your feet have to be on the floor
mm oh yeah it's just the same in many ways as doing um an aerobics session on the floor
except that you're using the water as resistance instead of using weights and things like that
but it certainly is a good workout
no I'd do it if it was er in the Mediterranean
one of my friends has got a free two week pass to the LA Fitness in Kings Heath
yeah I was thinking of maybe trying that but they've just got so many different classes that I just don't know
well you're best off keeping it I don't know whether they have a a a system where you can see how difficult the class is they do at David Lloyd
it's colour co coordinated so that you know how what sort of level it is
you would be better to pick something on a fairly low level to start with to see what it's like
Cos there's no point in going in one of the hard ones and then being put off completely
hm yes I just don't want to go er to any of the classes that have got boom boom boom music
they all have boom boom boom music
and do you find that actually motivates you? Doesn't it just
it's better than doing it without the music
and the music that uses um she's got these sort of compilations of sixties and seventies
and we can sing along cos most of us are in the slightly older age group
and we all know the words
oh yeah and you can sing you know ABBA things
oh so she hasn't got m boom boom boom music?
there is some yes she does have some boom boom boom music um
but it's it is better with the music I have to say
no I mean I love music I just don't like
the annoying thing is that there is a spin class going on upstairs at the same time
mm huh the woman who takes it she's got um a microphone on
you can hear her above everything else there are times when we have to get the pool attendant to go on the phone and say can you put the volume down a bit?
Well I can believe it in do you remember I was doing some step aerobics
in Murcia? And yeah the woman who was doing it had like a a mouthpiece
at us over the top of the boom boom boom music
and but the grou the gym was on the ground floor of a residential apartment block
it was okay one two three to the side
the people who were immediately above that gym
must have been tearing their hair out
then again the Spanish people are more
true they live with noise don't they
it would be worth you going in to see um what sort of classes they've got on offer see if they've got pilates cos pilates
yep I'd even go to a Zumba class again
oh my God I saw a Zumba class
I looked at myself in the mirror cos we were doing it in front of a mirror
and I just thought oh my life I look so stupid
I'm never coming back to this class again and then I just took a moment to look at everybody else
and I was like oh it's alright
they all look silly yeah yeah Becky when they started Zumba classes at David Lloyd she went and she said I can't do half the things they want me to do
and also it's so fast paced
that once you've mastered one particular step that they're doing at that time
they've moved onto the next one
but I do think the more you go the easier it is because
well the ea yeah because you learn the steps
you know it's like line dancing
it does seem to be the same
no that's right yeah have a look at at what classes they
see er there was one that goes on this morning at David Lloyd it's almost like um huh kick boxing to music it looks quite interesting
but I don't know what else they do because I don't do any of the other classes I don't have time I can't fit any more things in
well already with your three tennis lessons
two tennis lessons two personal training
two personal training and two aqua aerobics if I can fit the second one because just lately I've been working every Friday morning so I haven't been able to go
which is a bit of a nuisance but I don't have any choice so if it has to go it has to go
well that's not bad six exercise sessions a week sometimes five
mm but I'm not as cardio-vasularly fit as I was
no cos I'm not doing the treadmill stuff
oh right were you fitter when you were doing that?
how did you notice that made a difference?
I don't get I didn't get so out of breath tennis and things like that
mm because when I start getting tired and out of breath like that I go silly and I have to laugh and
it just And then after a while when we've been playing for a while
maybe you maybe you go all silly because your body needs oxygen
and your body's way of getting oxygen is by laughing and huh ha ha ha ha ha ha huh ha ha ha

well I can just we'll be playing and be doing a rally and all of a sudden I've lost it but tonight by the I'm alright until half past eight and once you go past half past eight the concentration goes the coordination goes
and I can't do anything but no it's good fun and that's the most important thing that you have fun doing it and you have a laugh
mm although although the er la la la is there always the same group of people?
yep yep three oh there's four of us huh yeah four of us have been going now for puh three four years on a Monday night
yep no as far as the driving is concerned it it's only a second lesson
oh it does knacker me though I

he said to me while I was driving just getting ready to turn left er at a junction he said so what are you planning what are you planning for the rest of the day? And I was like rest of the day? What? Uh? Okay wait there sorry I've just I'm concentrating
so hard on everything that I I haven't got space in my mind to think about the rest of the day at the moment sorry
no you'll get used to that
it's there's so many things to think about and to do in a se set procedure and
it's very easy to get things in the wrong order to start with
but no as I say remember it's only your second lesson so

he is kind of I f I feel that he's making he's taking me quite quicky cos he can see that I'm quite capable and whereas I can do it er I know whereas I know I can do it when he's there telling me what to do I don't feel confident in doing it without him telling me to do it so in a way I kind of wish that he wouldn't take me so quickly

but the but the thing is I also want to you see I don't know whether huh it's probably cos I'm just not getting practice but then again no I don't think it's that I'm not getting practice I think I just would prefer for him to take me through it and then let me do it myself two or three times
that's the most important part getting the instructor
to do it the way in which you feel more comfortable and if that's
how you feel more comfortable then tell him
At the moment I'll defer to his expertise but um you see for example if I said if I told him the way I want to do it I E please take me where there are no other cars at all
it's probably actually not a very good thing for me to learn how to drive
in a vacuum without other cars around is it cos
it it's true and as I said before it is only your second lesson
I know but tomorrow he wants us going up the doing sixty miles an hour in fourth gear
Or maybe forty miles an hour in fourth gear

forty miles an hour in fourth gear he said
yes because you'd be speeding if you did
sixty miles an hour down the it depends on which bit of the he's going to take you on
turn left and then left by Safeways so that you come off the there
er it's two two lanes of traffic so you'll be fine
mm well luckily so far all the other cars that I've encountered have been very patient
yes good but I when I see another car I'm always thinking oh God if I was a
if I was a driver like was it you yesterday? I hate it when people do that I hate it when people don't
pull out when you're signalling for them to pull out and
it's it's that they don't look
that's what annoys me that they don't look at you and see what you are doing and er act accordingly it drives me round the bend
what drives me round the bend is people who don't signal so you don't know where they're going
yes yes and if that happens you have to work on the principle that they are going to go where you want to go and you let them go
if subsequently they turn off that's fine but it's you don't assume anything when you're driving it doesn't do
yes I know but I just don't know the h think I have any more mental space
no no no but I I'm thinking about so many things at once
yes you're thinking about them now but as you go on you won't have to think about them
it'll come automatically so you know
but not changing gears and why you have to change gears and what gear it's best to be in at a given moment
well that's something you just learn by experience
but say I used to tell grandad by the sound of the engine when he was going to change gear
so again you'll find that'll come
with time but you do need to get some practice in so I suppose I have to speak to your father about getting you on my insurance to drive my car
not if you're not happy doing that
oh I it's I'm it's not so I'm not happy about you going out practising um I'm more concerned about you passing your test and wanting my car
I'd never do that it's your car isn't it
it's your car of course I wouldn't
you wouldn't manage you father's car anyway

and not say anything you'd probably be alright
um but I'm not sure that I would be much better
oh no I think you would be but again I d I j I'm not particularly confident going out on the
have another few lessons before you even think about that
you've got to get used to it

or what I'd maybe like to do with you would be to go to the old carpark or something and just practise like have no other cars around and just practise the whole mechanics of what do you do when you come up to a junction if you're in second gear and you have to stop and duddle uddle uddle er and just practise it and get some feedback on
what does he tell you to do?
I don't know mum that's the thing he's put he gives me instructions all the way through the lesson so I'm not actually taking anything in at the moment I'm just

automatic cars are fine except if you take your test on an automatic car you cannot drive a manual

but why aren't all cars just automatic? Why because dad said what was it he said the last time? Oh I know but you'll you'll learn to appreciate a manual gearbox it's like why?

because automatically I went to change gear and I kept hitting the brake
oh it's ri it's just two

left and right accelerate and brake
